Header: No room for debates out of parliament agenda tomorrow
Content: Leader of the House Minister Lakshman Kiriella said that according to the parliament agenda, only the names of the three persons proposed for the Constitutional Council will be passed when parliament convenes tomorrow . He stated this regarding the statement made by former Minister Bandula Gunawardana. Former Minister Bandula Gunawardana earlier stated that priority should be given to the debate of the no confidence motion against Finance Minister Ravi Karunanayake when parliament meets tomorrow . Meanwhile, Minister Lakshman Kiriella said that parliament would only pass the names of the three civil society representatives proposed to the Constitutional Council, when the House meets tomorrow .
